fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 245.96 lakh crore compared with Rs 181.72 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 declined 34 points or 0.20% to settle at 16,951.70. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 2.23% to 15.1000. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
